body_html: @martinwicke That's unrelated. I forgot to add the TF_BUILD_SERIAL_TESTS=1 to the build configuration, which is required for GPU tests because concurrent running of the GPU tests is known to cause OOM errors. We can consider adding TF_BUILD_SERIAL_TESTS=1 as an automatic default for GPU to ci_parameterized_build.sh.

body: @martinwicke That's unrelated. I forgot to add the TF_BUILD_SERIAL_TESTS=1 to the build configuration, which is required for GPU tests because concurrent running of the GPU tests is known to cause OOM errors. We can consider adding TF_BUILD_SERIAL_TESTS=1 as an automatic default for GPU to ci_parameterized_build.sh.
